## window variable

Creates or fills a given buffer with results of window function `fn`<!-- -->. The buffer size MUST be the same as the signal length given to [fft](./dsp.fft.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
window: (fn: import("@thi.ng/api").Fn2<number, number, number>, lenOfBuf: number | Float32Array | Float64Array) => FloatArray
```
